title: Did Wilmington ever have a new car Auto Show? I\'m talking about an event lasting several days where the newest released models were shown, and the general public could come and see them all in one place.   If there was one in the past, why is it no longer held? Is Wilmington just not large enough?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=17683
